txt.en:
'So what shall it be, [placeholder]?'

You tell Jarl Gurthilm that you would be glad to accept your share of the Khundolar's gold.

'You surprise me, [placeholder]... perhaps we're more alike than I thought. There was a light in your eyes during the battle with the Khundolar, and not all of it came from the shimmering gold...

'If that is your wish, consider it done! Bloth치ra has divided the shares, and yours is in his keeping. Speak to him, and it is yours!

'If our paths are so strange and winding as to cross again, you would be welcome among our company.'

'You'll take your gold?

'I must admit, I wagered a small portion of my share that you would refuse it. I suppose there's more sorting to be done then... Gurthilm must be delighted.

'We do not battle without the promise of rewards, and with all you have done, you should consider doing the same!'

'As promised, here is your share.'
With their foes slain and the wealth of the Khundolar in their grasp, the Variags have decided to return to Khand once their final errand is finished.
A Just Reward - Spoils of War
Bloth치ra can be found to the south-east of Aragorn's camp on the border of Dagorlad.\n\nYou have chosen to accept your share of the gold, and Bloth치ra can deliver it to you when you are prepared.
